Str_Arg.FuncTxt: local self = GetMyPCObject(); if IsBuffApplied(self, 'EnchantFire_Buff') == 'YES' then return "I_wizard_fireball_force_fire#Dummy_tsf_atk_force", 0.7; elseif IsBuffApplied(self,'Drain_Buff') == 'YES' then return "I_wizard_DarkTheurge_darkball_loop_force", 0.4; else return "I_force007_vilolet#Dummy_tsf_atk_force", 0.7; end

local self = GetMyPCObject(); if IsBuffApplied(self, 'EnchantFire_Buff') == 'YES' then return "F_wizard_fireball_hit_explosion", 0.5; elseif IsBuffApplied(self,'Drain_Buff') == 'YES' then return "F_wizard_Drain_hit", 0.5; else return "I_explosion008_violet", 0.7; end

local self = GetMyPCObject(); if IsBuffApplied(self, 'EnchantFire_Buff') == 'YES' then return "I_wizard_fireball_force_fire#Dummy_tsf_atk_force", 0.7; elseif IsBuffApplied(self, 'Drain_Buff') == 'YES' then return "I_wizard_DarkTheurge_darkball_loop_force", 0.4; else return "I_force007_vilolet#Dummy_tsf_atk_force", 0.7; end
